page.title: 15TELEVISION TODAY
page.content: FOR THE PAST TWO DAYS I HAVE BEEN CARRYING OUT A SURVEY ABOUT WHAT PEOPLE THINK OF TELEVISION. I INTERVIEWED 10 PEOPLE AND HERE IS MY ANALYSIS: THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF TIME SPENT WATCHING TELEVISION IS 3 HOURS PER DAY. MY SECOND QUESTION WAS 'DO YOU THINK THAT TELEVISION CAN BE IMPROVED IN ANY WAY? 60% SAID{YES.}40% SAID THAT IT WAS ALL RIGHT AS IT IS. OF THE 6 PEOPLE WHO WANTED IT CHANGED,2 THOUGHT THERE SHOULD BE NO VIOLENCE SHOWN AND ONE SUGGESTED THAT THERE SHOULD BE MORE AIR TIME. TWO PEOPLE THOUGHT THAT THERE SHOULD BE NO COMMERCIALS AND 1 PERSON SAID THAT THERE SHOULD BE MORE CHANNELS AVAILABLE. SIX OUT OF TEN PEOPLE PREFERRED I.T.V. AND TWO PEOPLE PREFERRED B.B.C.1
